abstract: Carl Icahn rarely minces words, and his blunt talk was on full display Thursday in a letter to the chairman of Yahoo‘s board, Roy Bostock. In the letter, Mr. Icahn formally announced his intention to seek the ouster of the Web giant’s board unless it moved quickly to restart talks to be acquired by Microsoft.

headline.main: Icahn Says Yahoo ‘Completely Botched’ Microsoft Talks
